Partial Mouse Control.tooltip: Allows scrolling by hovering near edge of map - pair with 'laptop with mouse' keybindings.

Automatic Job Assignments.tooltip: The labormanager plugin automates job assignments, replacing tools such as Dwarf Therapist.

Other Automation plugins.command: multicmd autonestbox start; repeat -time 7 -timeUnits days -command [ burial ] -name burial
Other Automation plugins.tooltip: Enables the autonestbox and burial scripts.

Enhanced Gameplay.tooltip: Adds Human merchants (more trade deals) and Elvish diplomats (logging quotas).

Don't Cook Tallow.tooltip: Prevents the cooking of tallow into inedible roasts, saving it for the soap industry.

Stonesense Isometric view.tooltip:
Opens an isometric visualizer in a separate window.
 Run in-game with 'ssense overlay', but ONLY in PRINT_MODE:2D (crashes otherwise)

Performance Tweaks.command: multicmd tweak fast-heat 100; repeat -time 1 -timeUnits months -command [ multicmd cleanowned X ; clean all ]
Performance Tweaks.tooltip:
DFHack fixes to run regularly, changes the game a little but helps a lot on old or slow hardware.
 (fast-heat, dump worn items, remove all contaminants)

Autoprune Dead/Missing List.tooltip: Removes uninteresting dead units (slaughtered and other unnamed creatures) from the unit list.
